snippet: Jurors took one day to find Tyshawn Brockington guilty of shooting Tayshana Murphy in a battle between two housing projects.
abstract: Jury convicts Tyshawn Brockington of second-degree murder in shooting death of high school basketball star Tayshana Murphy in 2011; prosecutors say Murphy was innocent victim of rivalry between fighting young men of two neighboring housing projects in Harlem; jury deliberated for one day before handing down conviction, which carries sentence of 15 years to life in prison.
lead_paragraph: Jurors took one day to find Tyshawn Brockington guilty of shooting Tayshana Murphy in a battle between two housing projects.

headline.seo: Harlem Man Convicted of Killing High-School Basketball Star
headline.main: Jury Convicts Harlem Man in Killing of a High School Basketball Star
headline.print_headline: Jury Convicts Harlem Man in Killing of a High School Basketball Star
